dc_description_s: This shaoefile represents point locations within the United States for common recreational landmarks including golf courses, amusement parks, beaches, and park and recreation areas. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2.U.S. Recreation Areas provides the locations of common recreational landmarks including golf courses, amusement parks, beaches, and park and recreation areas. Each recreation area is named and shows the state and county in which it resides.
